channel.title: Text then login
channel.description: How do i make a text thing ( text box ) then i login too my server its there and u have too click "close windows" too move ?

item.title: Text then login
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Search for this:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

and add this under that:

[code]public void customInterface(){

}[/code]

Then search for this:

public void initialize()

and below the }

add this:

customInterface();

Then go back to:

public void customInterface(){

and add this:

//misc interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 18447);//Close Text sendQuest("", 18450);//Title sendQuest("", 18451);//Sub Title sendQuest("", 18439);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 18440);//Line 2 sendQuest("", 18441);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 18442);//Line 4 sendQuest("", 18443);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 18446);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 18445);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 18444);//Line 8 showInterface(18436); flushOutStream();

Read full topic
